citations.narrative:
The licensee has moved to new location. There was no notification to the Agency of the move. The new site may not be
covered under the current license. A license is issued to specific persons and for approved sites. The licensee must
notify Animal Care at least 90 days prior to a substantial change in business, such as the location of the animals.
Keeping Animal Care informed as to the location of the regulated animals allows for the required unannounced
inspections to ensure compliance with the Animal Welfare Act. Correct by: March 22, 2023

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:10 pm on 28-FEB-
2023. Arrived at the facility and observed that the shed used by the licensee to house the hedgehogs was no longer
there. The licensee confirmed by phone on 9-MAR-2023 that she had moved to a new location.
End Section

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
The licensee has moved to new location.  There was no notification to the Agency of the move.  The new site may not be 
covered under the current license.  A license is issued to specific persons and for approved sites.  The licensee must 
notify Animal Care at least 90 days prior to a substantial change in business, such as the location of the animals.   
 
Keeping Animal Care informed as to the location of the regulated animals allows for the required unannounced 
inspections to ensure compliance with the Animal Welfare Act.  Correct by:  March 22, 2023 
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:10 pm on 28-FEB-
2023.  Arrived at the facility and observed that the shed used by the licensee to house the hedgehogs was no longer 
there.  The licensee confirmed by phone on 9-MAR-2023 that she had moved to a new location. 
 
 
 
End Section
